short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's like DuoLingo & Apple News had a love child.
short.es: Descubra cosas interesantes para leer en su idioma extranjero favorito usando Omelette.
short.fr: Découvrez des choses intéressantes à lire dans votre langue étrangère préférée en utilisant Omelette.
short.it: Scopri cose interessanti da leggere nella tua lingua straniera preferita usando Omelette.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Read in a foreign language like a PRO.
- Right-click any word or sentence to lookup the meaning (Google 
  Translate & WordReference in one easy popup window)
- Save words to your personal dictionary and test yourself by blurring 
  definitions.
long.es,fr,it: Easily discover words in a different language and save them to your personal dictionary.
